languages.text: Темные тени мечутся внутри монолита, и стоны отчаяния слышатся на краю сознания. Могущество. Боль. Обреченность. Вечность. Души скорбят об уготованной им судьбе.
Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.
languages.original_text: Темные тени мечутся внутри монолита, и стоны отчаяния слышатся на краю сознания. Могущество. Боль. Обреченность. Вечность. Души скорбят об уготованной им судьбе.

languages.text: Des ombres noires s'agitent à l'intérieur du monolithe, et vous pouvez entendre, à la limite de votre conscience, leurs gémissements de désespoir. Pouvoir. Douleur. Damnation. Éternité. Les âmes font le deuil de leurs propres destins.
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: Des ombres noires s'agitent à l'intérieur du monolithe, et vous pouvez entendre, à la limite de votre conscience, leurs gémissements de désespoir. Pouvoir. Douleur. Damnation. Éternité. Les âmes font le deuil de leurs propres destins.

languages.text: モノリスの内部には暗い影がうごめき、意識の端でその影たちの絶望のうめき声を拾うことができる。力。苦痛。天罰。永遠。魂は自らの運命を嘆いている。
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: モノリスの内部には暗い影がうごめき、意識の端でその影たちの絶望のうめき声を拾うことができる。力。苦痛。天罰。永遠。魂は自らの運命を嘆いている。

languages.text: 灵魂石内部回荡着黑暗的阴影。在你意识的边缘，你仿佛听到了那些灵魂绝望的呻吟：权力、痛苦、诅咒、永恒。那些灵魂在哀悼它们的命运。
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: 灵魂石内部回荡着黑暗的阴影。在你意识的边缘，你仿佛听到了那些灵魂绝望的呻吟：权力、痛苦、诅咒、永恒。那些灵魂在哀悼它们的命运。

languages.text: Dunkle Schatten winden sich im Inneren des Monolithen, und am Rande deines Bewusstseins kannst du ihr verzweifeltes Stöhnen wahrnehmen. Macht. Schmerz. Verdammnis. Ewigkeit. Die Seelen beklagen ihr eigenes Schicksal.
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: Dunkle Schatten winden sich im Inneren des Monolithen, und am Rande deines Bewusstseins kannst du ihr verzweifeltes Stöhnen wahrnehmen. Macht. Schmerz. Verdammnis. Ewigkeit. Die Seelen beklagen ihr eigenes Schicksal.

languages.text: Unas sombras oscuras se arremolinan en el interior del Monolito, y apenas en el margen de tu consciencia logras percibir sus gemidos de desesperación. Poder. Dolor. Condena. Eternidad. Las almas lamentan su propio destino.
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: Unas sombras oscuras se arremolinan en el interior del Monolito, y apenas en el margen de tu consciencia logras percibir sus gemidos de desesperación. Poder. Dolor. Condena. Eternidad. Las almas lamentan su propio destino.

languages.text: Monolitin içinde kara gölgeler kıpırdanıyor. Bilincinin bir ucunda, çaresiz feryatlarını işitebiliyorsun. Güç. Izdırap. Yıkım. Ebediyet. Bu ruhlar, kendi kaderlerinin yasını tutuyor.
languages.original_text: Dark shades roil inside the Monolith, and, at the edge of your consciousness, you can pick up their moans of despair. Power. Pain. Damnation. Eternity. The souls are mourning their own fate.

traits.locale_text: Monolitin içinde kara gölgeler çalkalanıyor ve bilincinin eşiğinde o şekillerin çaresiz feryatlarını işitebiliyorsun. Güç. Izdırap. Lanetlenme. Ebediyet. Bu ruhlar, kendi kaderlerinin yasını tutuyor.
